title: Walmart's Black Friday TV deals are live - get a 50-inch 4K TV on sale for $248
author: mackenzie-frazier
summary: Snag this epic Black Friday TV deal before it's too late
article: Black Friday TV deals just launched at Walmart's early sale with stunningly low prices on a range of 4K TVs. Walmart brought back the best Black Friday TV deal from its first sale, which is this 50-inch 4K TV from Sceptre that's on sale for just $248 (was $328). That's the lowest price we've ever seen and an incredible deal for a 50-inch 4K smart TV. This Black Friday TV deal sold out when Walmart's launched its first Black Friday sale, and we predict the same future for today's bargain. We don't expect to see a lower price during the official Black Friday sale, so we'd snap up this incredible offer today.
